title: [K-12] Transformative Learning Course for Designing Online Communities of Wisdom

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social constructivist learning theories and online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Advanced learner-focused course centered on knowledge sharing through social interaction in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can design communities of practice based on sociocultural constructivism principles in online environments.
Learners can develop educational models integrating knowledge innovation and mentoring systems using VR simulations.
Learners can improve online communities of practice design models based on assessment results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
